directions: Mix tuna, cilantro, creamy dressing, onion, celery, relish, and mustard together in a bowl until evenly-combined.
ingredients: 2 (5 ounce) cans water-packed albacore tuna, drained and broken into chunks
1/2 cup low-fat creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip Light®)
1 tablespoon prepared mustard, or to taste
title: Tuna Salad with a Kick
